alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 1:50PM MST until December 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Areas of snow drifts and black ice on roads. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Areas of black ice and previously drifted snow banks will continue to affect area roadways this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several roadways remain slick this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
